name: Ronika.Exe
description:
Totally not a ripoff of [REDACTED] ;)

Warning!! This game contains adult language!!

Plot:

You wake up and go to your computer and find a strange file?

This is a game I made in a day and am looking to continue web game development in the future.

Controls:

Z = A

X = B

Arrow keys to move

Guide:

Bad Ending: Select "Screw this" when talking to Ronika

(OTHER ENDINGS ARE YET TO BE ADDED)

Please comment whether you would like to see me continue with this game, and please donate if you can ;)

All the funds recieved from this game are going towards working headphones
